debug.module.php

00001 <?
00002 class OsimoDebug extends OsimoModule{
00003  private $modules;
00004  private $scriptStart,$scriptEnd;
00005  private $timers_start;
00006  private $timer_desc;
00007  private $timer_duration;
00008  private $msgs;
00009  private $errors;
00010  private $error_backtrace;
00011  private $override;
00012  
00013  function OsimoDebug($options=false,$override=true,$visibility=array()){
00014   parent::OsimoModule();
00015   $this->modules = $options;
00016   $this->override = $override;
00017   $this->visibility = $visibility;
00018   $this->scriptStart = microtime(true);
00019  }
00020  
00021  public function register($module,$defaults){
00022   if(isset($this->modules[$module])){
00023    foreach($defaults as $option=>$val){
00024     if(!isset($this->modules[$module][$option])){
00025      $this->modules[$module][$option] = $val;
00026     }
00027    }
00028   }
00029   else{
00030    $this->modules[$module] = $defaults;
00031   }
00032  }
00033  
00034  public function enabled($module,$type){
00035   if($this->override == true){ return false; }
00036   if(is_bool($this->visibility) && $this->visibility == false){ return false; }
00037   elseif(is_array($this->visibility) && is_object(get('user')) && !in_array(get('user')->username,$this->visibility)){ return false; }
00038   
00039   if(isset($this->modules[$module][$type]) && $this->modules[$module][$type] == true){
00040    return true;
00041   }
00042   
00043   return false;
00044  }
00045  
00046  public function timerStart($module,$name){
00047   if(!$this->enabled($module,'benchmarking')){ return true; }
00048   $this->timers_start[$module][$name] = microtime(true);
00049  }
00050  
00051  public function timerEnd($module,$name,$prepend=false){
00052   if(isset($this->timers_start[$module][$name])){
00053    $duration = microtime(true) - $this->timers_start[$module][$name];
00054    if($prepend){
00055     $this->logMsg($module,'benchmarking',$prepend . (microtime(true) - $this->timers_start[$module][$name])." seconds");
00056    }
00057    else{
00058     $this->logMsg($module,'benchmarking',(microtime(true) - $this->timers_start[$module][$name])." seconds");
00059    }
00060    
00061    return $duration;
00062   }
00063   
00064   return false;
00065  }
00066  
00067  public function logError($module,$type,$error){
00068   if($this->enabled($module,$type)){
00069    $error = rawurlencode($error);
00070    $this->errors[] = "$module - $type: $error";
00071   }
00072  }
00073  
00074  public function logMsg($module,$type,$msg){
00075   if($this->enabled($module,$type)){
00076    $type = ucwords(str_replace("_"," ",$type));
00077    $msg = rawurlencode($msg);
00078    $this->msgs[] = "$module - $type: $msg";
00079   }
00080  }
00081  
00082  public function output_log(){
00083   if(count($this->msgs) == 0 && count($this->errors) == 0){ return true; }
00084   
00085   $output = array(
00086    'msgs'=>count($this->msgs) > 0 ? $this->msgs : array(),
00087    'errors'=>count($this->errors) > 0 ? $this->errors : array()
00088   );
00089   echo '<div id="OsimoDebug">'.json_encode($output).'</div>';
00090  }
00091  
00092  /*
00093   * error() will always output a PHP error because it uses trigger_error().
00094   * If you wish to log an issue but possibly not output it, or output it at a
00095   * specific time in the script, then use the logError() function above.
00096   */
00097  public function error($msg,$line,$function,$file,$fatal=false){
00098   $msg .= " in $file::$function(), line $line";
00099   $fatal ? trigger_error($msg,E_USER_ERROR) : trigger_error($msg);
00100  }
00101  
00102  public function disabled(){
00103   return $this->override;
00104  }
00105  
00106  public function scriptEnd(){
00107   if($this->disabled()){ return true; }
00108   $this->scriptEnd = microtime(true);
00109   $this->msgs[] = "Total script approx. execution time: ".($this->scriptEnd - $this->scriptStart);
00110  }
00111 }
00112 ?>
